title: In a Real Pinch! Luffy Sinks into the Ice-cold Lake!
author: Toei Animation
description: Official streaming source for Episode 586 on Crunchyroll with both subtitled and dubbed versions available.

title: LAW VS SMOKER! | One Piece Episode 586 and 587 REACTION
author: Unknown Reactor
description: Reaction video covering One Piece episodes 586 and 587, focusing on the Law vs Smoker confrontation.

title: 586-588: In a Real Pinch! Luffy Sinks Into the Ice-Cold Lake!
author: Never Watched One Piece Blog
description: Blog post reviewing and discussing episodes 586-588, including analysis of Law's abilities and the body swap mechanics. Author notes the cliffhanger ending was too compelling to stop watching.

title: Episode 130: Chapters 586-590
author: One Piece at a Time
description: Podcast discussion covering manga chapters 586-590, which includes the content adapted in Episode 586. Discusses Law's return, body swaps, and the dark implications of Punk Hazard.

title: One Piece (Punk Hazard) Anime Review and Discussion
author: DoubleSama
description: Comprehensive review of the Punk Hazard arc, noting that while it may not have been the most engaging saga, it sets up a lot of future sagas in One Piece.

title: One Piece: The Best Stuff In The Punk Hazard Arc
author: Sequential Planet
description: Article highlighting the best moments of the Punk Hazard arc, including discussion of Law's body-swapping abilities and key character interactions.

title: One Piece: The Ope Ope no Mi Devil Fruit, Explained
author: Game Rant
description: Detailed explanation of Law's Ope Ope no Mi Devil Fruit powers, including the ROOM ability and Shambles technique featured prominently in Episode 586.

title: One Piece: How Trafalgar Law's Macabre Ope Ope Fruit Works
author: CBR
description: Analysis article explaining the mechanics and applications of Law's Ope Ope no Mi, including the Shambles body-swapping technique and surgical abilities.
